Hero.title: Understand your lease in <minutes>minutes</minutes>
Hero.description: Upload your lease PDF and get instant AI analysis of terms, rights, and red flags. Make informed rental decisions with confidence and clarity.

Creator.institution: University of Chicago Law School • AI Lab

aiAnalysis.title: Get instant AI analysis of your lease
aiAnalysis.description: Upload your lease PDF and receive comprehensive analysis in minutes. Our AI detects red flags, explains complex terms, identifies important dates, and provides actionable insights about your rental agreement.
aiAnalysis.stat1Description: Fast analysis that examines every clause, identifies potential issues, and explains what matters most in plain English.
aiAnalysis.stat2Description: No signup required. Upload your lease and get instant analysis with detailed breakdowns and personalized insights.

stateLaws.title: Understand your state's landlord-renter laws
stateLaws.description: Access comprehensive information about your rights as a renter. Learn about security deposits, lease terminations, maintenance obligations, and legal protections specific to your state and city.
stateLaws.stat1Description: Complete coverage of landlord-renter laws across all US states with city-specific regulations and requirements.
stateLaws.stat2Description: Current legal information with sources cited, so you always have accurate and reliable renter law guidance.

marketData.title: Compare your rental data with market trends
marketData.description: See how your lease compares to thousands of rentals in your area. Get instant insights on market rates, price percentiles, and whether you're getting a fair deal on your rental agreement.
marketData.stat1Description: Active leases analyzed to provide you with accurate market comparisons and pricing insights for your area.
marketData.stat2Description: Up-to-date market data helps you understand if your rent is competitive and make informed decisions.

Disclaimer.text: This is a beta product. It uses AI and may provide wrong information. Anything you upload will be shared with ChatGPT. LeaseWise provides legal information, not legal advice. Using LeaseWise does not create an attorney-client relationship. LeaseWise is not your attorney.

AnalyzePage.title: Analyze your lease
AnalyzePage.subtitle: Upload your lease PDF and enter your property address to get instant AI-powered analysis

documentUpload.title: Lease Document

rights.title: Know Your Renter Rights
rights.searchPlaceholder: Search by law type, explanation, or statute...

footer.disclaimer: ⚠️ Legal Information Only: Not legal advice. Consult an attorney.

keyDates.title: Key Dates
keyDates.noticeForRenewal: Notice to Owner for Lease Renewal
keyDates.noticeForRenewalDesc: Resident must notify Owner at least 60 days prior to the expiration of the lease.

SourceCitation.exactText: This is the exact text from your lease document that was used to extract this information.
SourceCitation.translationError: Sorry, we couldn't translate this text. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

PDFViewer.title: Lease PDF Viewer
PDFViewer.footerText: The PDF has been opened to page {pageNumber} where the source text is located. Use the controls above to navigate and zoom.
